field.name: height
field.label: Height
field.description: Height of widget

field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: Width of widget

field.name: howSpeed
field.label: howSpeed
field.description: Display the slow/med/fast speed options

field.name: autoStart
field.label: autoStart
field.description: Start playing the slideshow as soon as its loaded OR don't start until they click the show

field.name: captions
field.label: captions
field.description: Display image captions within the slideshow

field.name: showLogo
field.label: showLogo
field.description: Show our smugmug logo in the corner of the slideshow

field.name: clickToImage
field.label: clickToImage
field.description: Clicking on the image shown in the slideshow will take you to the image in its gallery

field.name: splashurl
field.label: splashurl
field.description: Url to an image you want to set as your splash image

field.name: splashDelay
field.label: splashDelay
field.description: The amount of time to have to splash show in milliseconds.

field.name: showThumbs
field.label: showThumbs
field.description: Show thumbnails

field.name: albumID
field.label: AlbumID
field.description: ID of album to show photos from -> The album ID is located in the URL when viewing any of your albums, for instance in the url http://cmac.smugmug.com/gallery/2504559_f3ta9#131481399, the album id is the set of numbers after /gallery/ and before the #-symbol followed by the ImageID - in this example the AlbumID is 2504559 -> SEMI-REQUIRED You must either provide an AlbumID OR a feedURL as below or nothing works.

field.name: albumKey
field.label: AlbumKey
field.description: Key of album to show photos from The album key is located in the URL when viewing any of your albums, for instance in the url http://cmac.smugmug.com/gallery/2504559_f3ta9#131481399, the album key is the string of characters after /gallery/2504559_ and before the #-symbol followed by the ImageID - in this example the AlbumKey is f3ta9 SEMI-REQUIRED You must either provide an AlbumID and AlbumKey OR a feedURL as below or nothing works.

field.name: showStartButton
field.label: showStartButton
field.description: Whether a play/pause button shows

field.name: showButtons
field.label: showButtons
field.description: Whether to show any play/pause/next buttons

field.name: transparent
field.label: transparent
field.description: This should just always be true, its if the slideshow is transparent or not, can also bgColor otherwise

field.name: bgColor
field.label: bgColor
field.description: Specify a background color for the slideshow as opposed to being transparent.

field.name: crossFadeSpeed
field.label: crossFadeSpeed
field.description: The speed (in ms) of the crossfade.

field.name: feedURL
field.label: feedURL
field.description: feed url to use; must be api.smugmug.com instead of nickname.smugmug.com

field.name: randomStart
field.label: randomStart
field.description: Leaves the images in the original order but starts at a random location

field.name: randomize
field.label: randomize
field.description: Shuffles the order of images in the slideshow and starts at the beginning

field.name: borderThickness
field.label: borderThickness
field.description: Thickness of the border around each image

field.name: borderColor
field.label: borderColor
field.description: Specify the color of the border. Both borderThickness AND borderColor must be specified for the border to show

field.name: forceSize
field.label: forceSize
field.description: Force the slideshow to use a standard sized photo regardless of slideshow size

field.name: borderCornerStyle
field.label: borderCornerStyle
field.description: Sets the border style if using borders

field.name: imgAlign
field.label: imgAlign
field.description: Aligns the displayed image at the top of the slideshow area
